```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggfortify)
```

```{r fortify.varprd, cache = TRUE}
data(Canada, package = 'vars')
d.var <- vars::VAR(Canada, p = 3, type = 'const')
fortify(stats::predict(d.var, n.ahead = 50))



```
